Description.Text:
Position The HOTEL EVEREST , under family management, is a completely new building situated in Arco's wonderful plain only 5 km drive from the lake Garda.
Restaurant Dining-room capacity 130 seats. Attractive menu for wedding. The restaurant offers an excellent cuisine with local and international specialities.
Outside The hotel offers garden, swimming-pool and bar. The swimming pool is approximately opened from may to september.
More Informations The hotel has: fitness-centre, sauna, hydromassage, swimming-pool and internet point.
ARRIVALS Check in: from 13.00 p.m.
